title: Data Fetching with useEffect
instructions:
Create a component that fetches and displays user data.

Requirements:
1. Fetch user data from the provided mock API
2. Show 'Loading...' while fetching
3. Display user name and email when loaded
4. Handle and display errors gracefully
5. Add a 'Refresh' button to refetch data

This exercise practices async operations with useEffect, including handling loading and error states.
